definitions.definition: The white root of a yellow-flowered plant , Brassica rapa , grown as a vegetable and as fodder for cattle.
The yellow root of a related plant, the swede or Brassica napus .
definitions.label_groups: Scotland , Ireland , Northern England , Cornwall , Atlantic Canada

definitions.definition: The white root of Raphanus sativus var. longipinnatus , also known as a daikon .
The root of the yam bean , Pachyrhizus erosus ; jicama .
A large, heavy pocket watch, so called because its profile resembled the vegetable.

main_definition: The white root of a yellow-flowered plant , Brassica rapa , grown as a vegetable and as fodder for cattle.
secondary_definitions: ( Scotland , Ireland , Northern England , Cornwall , Atlantic Canada ) The yellow root of a related plant, the swede or Brassica napus .
( Hong Kong ) The white root of Raphanus sativus var. longipinnatus , also known as a daikon .
( Singapore , Malaysia , by extension ) The root of the yam bean , Pachyrhizus erosus ; jicama .
( dated ) A large, heavy pocket watch, so called because its profile resembled the vegetable.
